LandingPage.hero_description: Algorithmic intelligence for your peace of mind. Automate regulatory compliance (FDA) and take total control over your operations.
LandingPage.features_card1_desc: AI analyzes your temperature logs and generates immediate suggestions for anomalies.
LandingPage.features_card2_desc: Intelligent reading of your floor staff notes.
LandingPage.features_card3_desc: The interface instantly adapts to the native language of your kitchen brigade.
LandingPage.philosophy_intro: Most management software offers: static dashboards and dead data.
LandingPage.philosophy_vision: We offer a living workflow that prescribes action before the problem arrives.
LandingPage.philosophy_pillar1_desc: Health regulations and hygiene logs are silently validated within your team's daily flow. Simple and frictionless.
LandingPage.philosophy_pillar2_desc: The algorithm detects anomalies (temperatures, expiry dates, service notes) before they become hurdles. Leave the restaurant with a light mind.
LandingPage.philosophy_pillar3_desc: The system doesn't just archive your data: it automatically generates the exact corrective actions to follow in case of a problem.
LandingPage.protocol_phase1_desc: Import of your existing menu and configuration of your alerts.
LandingPage.protocol_phase2_desc: Artificial Intelligence classifies each dish and suggests corrective actions.
LandingPage.protocol_phase3_desc: Generation of social media posts and logbook summaries in multiple languages.
LandingPage.features_card1_ai_suggestion: Check the compressor and move the meats immediately.
